item.title: About me
item.description: Some hateful words about myself Hello! My name is Christian and I probably work for some big IT company in Germany at the moment. My main tasks usually involve complaining a lot, bitching about things I would have done differently and then leading everyone to glorious victory in case they finally obeyed my omniscient commands. It’s also called IT-Architect. I have a strong operations background. For all Software Developers or DevOps (who are basically Software Developer who know how to use Heroku and Co.
